CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Flash Newspicture Magazine, May 17, 1938, pg. 14 and 15, reads: "Activities Week at Pittsburgh's Y.M.C.A. - Beautiful Pittsburgh Debs took their share of the spotlight in parade of fashions, photo center, shows some of the cute young ladies who were mannequins, (l to r) Helene [Helen] Phillips, Alyce Lindsay, Thelma Spangler and Viola Howell togged out like the couturiers themselves in their latest Parisian creations. (Photos by 'Teenie' Harris)."Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 7, 1938, pg. 13, reads: "Exclusive! Gorgeous Gals 'Go Vogue' When Joe and Marva Come to Town for 'Y' Style Review - Four on a Bench - Spectators Sports Wear was featured by charming Helen Phillips, Thelma Spangler, Alyce Lindsay and Viola Howell... All Photos By Courier Staff Photographer"
TitMainTitle: Helen Phillips, Thelma Spangler, Alyce or Alice Lindsay, and Viola Howell wearing hats and seated on wicker sofa, for YMCA Junior Hostesses Fashion Review
